mapper.select: SELECT M.PROFILE PROFILE, R2.ADDR ADDR, R.CHECK_IN CHECK_IN, R.CHECK_OUT CHECK_OUT, R.PEOPLE PEOPLE, R3.KID KID, R3.BABY BABY, R3.PET PET, R3.SMOKE SMOKE, R3.PARTY PARTY FROM MEMBER M , RESERVATION R , ROOM R2, RULE R3 WHERE M.SEQ_M = R.SEQ_M AND R.SEQ_RM = R2.SEQ_RM AND R2.SEQ_RM = R3.SEQ_RM
